mapper.update:
/* IMMmbrEduMapper.update */ UPDATE im_mmbr_edu SET scl_nm = #{sclNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mjr_nm = #{mjrNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spec_nm = #{specNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dge_cdv = #{dgeCdv, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dge_ymd = #{dgeYmd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dge_file_id = #{dgeFileId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rech_tpc = #{rechTpc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_mdfer_id = #{lastMdferId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_mdfcn_dt = TO_CHAR(SYSDATETIME, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), last_mdfer_ip = #{lastMdferIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE mmbr_edu_id = #{mmbrEduId}
AND del_yn = 'N'

/* IMMmbrEduMapper.delete */ UPDATE im_mmbr_edu SET last_mdfer_id = #{lastMdferId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_mdfcn_dt = TO_CHAR(SYSDATETIME, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), last_mdfer_ip = #{lastMdferIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_yn = 'Y' WHERE mmbr_edu_id = #{mmbrEduId}
AND del_yn = 'N'
mapper.select:
/* IMMmbrEduMapper.selectList */ SELECT A.mmbr_edu_id AS "mmbrEduId", A.member_srl AS "memberSrl", A.scl_nm AS "sclNm", A.mjr_nm AS "mjrNm", A.spec_nm AS "specNm", A.dge_cdv AS "dgeCdv", A.dge_ymd AS "dgeYmd", A.dge_file_id AS "dgeFileId", A.rech_tpc AS "rechTpc", A.del_yn AS "delYn", A.frst_reger_id AS "frstRegerId", A.frst_reg_dt AS "frstRegDt", A.frst_reger_ip AS "frstRegerIp", A.last_mdfer_id AS "lastMdferId", A.last_mdfcn_dt AS "lastMdfcnDt", A.last_mdfer_ip AS "lastMdferIp"
FROM im_mmbr_edu A WHERE A.del_yn = 'N' AND member_srl = #{memberSrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.frst_reg_dt DESC
